biography.bio: Uwe Ochsenknecht was born on January 7, 1956 in Biblis, Hesse, Germany as Uwe Adam Ochsenknecht. He is an actor, known for Das Boot (1981), Schtonk (1992) and Illumination garantie (1999). He was previously married to Natascha Ochsenknecht.
biography.name: Uwe Ochsenknecht

biography.bio: Valerie Niehaus was born on October 11, 1974 in Emsdetten, Germany. She is an actress, known for Verbotene Liebe (1995), Flashback (2000) and Die Gustloff (2008).
biography.name: Valerie Niehaus

biography.bio: Emil Kresse is an actor, known for Überleben an der Wickelfront (2012).
biography.name: Emil Kresse

biography.bio: Niklas Kresse is an actor, known for Überleben an der Wickelfront (2012).
biography.name: Niklas Kresse

biography.bio: Leon Petatz is an actor, known for Überleben an der Wickelfront (2012).
biography.name: Leon Petatz

biography.bio: Luca Petatz is an actor, known for Überleben an der Wickelfront (2012).
biography.name: Luca Petatz

biography.bio: Alwara Höfels was born on April 6, 1982 in Kronberg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Rabbit Without Ears (2007), Un prof pas comme les autres (2013) and L'étrangère (2010).
biography.name: Alwara Höfels

biography.bio: Renate Krößner was born on May 17, 1945 in Osterode am Harz, Germany. She is an actress, known for Solo Sunny (1980), Vergiss dein Ende (2011) and Nordkurve (1992). She has been married to Bernd Stegemann since August 28, 2005.
biography.name: Renate Krößner

biography.bio: Anna Grisebach was born on March 20, 1974 in Göttingen, Lower Saxony, Germany. She is an actress, known for Bright Night (2014), Koslowski & Haferkamp (2014) and Der blinde Fleck (2013).
biography.name: Anna Grisebach

biography.bio: Oliver Stokowski was born on August 8, 1962 in Kassel, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Experiment (2001), The Book Thief (2013) and U-571 (2000).
biography.name: Oliver Stokowski

biography.bio: Sebastian Schipper was born on May 8, 1968 in Hannover, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Run Lola Run (1998), The English Patient (1996) and Victoria (2015).
biography.name: Sebastian Schipper

biography.bio: Marie-Lou Sellem was born on June 19, 1966 in Göttingen, Lower Saxony, Germany. She is an actress, known for Winter Sleepers (1997), No Regrets (2001) and Die Liebe der Kinder (2009).
biography.name: Marie-Lou Sellem

biography.bio: Ercan Durmaz was born on August 16, 1965 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Pour une poignée d'herbe (2000), Sophiiiie! (2002) and Was nicht passt wird passend gemacht (2003).
biography.name: Ercan Durmaz

biography.bio: Kida Khodr Ramadan was born on October 8, 1976 in Beirut, Lebanon. He is an actor, known for Unknown (2011), Kebab Connection (2004) and Tough Enough (2006).
biography.name: Kida Khodr Ramadan

biography.bio: Monica Reyes was born in Austria to an Australian father and a Spanish mother, which led to an upbringing in three different countries: Austria, Australia and Spain - and therefore three mother tongues: German, English and Spanish. She started her artistic career as a singer and theatre actress while still in high school. Although she was already making a living from acting, she decided to study Dramatic Arts and Music and was accepted at the renowned Conservatory of Vienna. After successfully graduating there she moved to Sydney and also completed a Master's Degree at the Australian Institute of Music. She was discovered for the film by the Austrian director Andreas Prochaska, whose comedy "The unintentional kidnapping of Mrs. Elfriede Ott" was a box-office hit and won the Austrian Film Acadamy Award in 2010 and led Monica to appearances in TV-series such as "Soko Kitzbühel" or "Schnell ermittelt", as well as feature films like "Tatort" or "Akte Grüninger". Monica Reyes is married to Emanuel Heisenberg, a grandchild of the physicist and Nobel Price winner Werner Heisenberg. They live in Berlin.
biography.name: Monica Reyes
